document_data.name: Laele Dhuurniv
document_data.mainbody: '''Laele Dhuurniv''' was a female [[drow]] and the [[Matron mother]] of [[House Dhuurniv]] of [[Maerimydra]].

History.Weeping War:
In [[712 DR]], she accepted the [[Spider's Truce]] which [[Aolis Ildacer]] offered the [[drow]]. However after battling alongside the elves in numerous battles against the [[Army of Darkness]], Laele treacherously killed Aolis but was eventually killed in [[713 DR]] by Aolis's wife, [[Amara Ildacer]], thereby ending the truce.
After her death, her three daughters, [[Aunrae Dhuurniv|Aunrae]], [[Greyanna Dhuurniv|Greyanna]] and [[Xullrae Dhuurniv|Xullrae]], took over leadership of [[House Dhuurniv]].
